ygData.subject: Thanks for the doing the math
ygData.msgSnippet: This is great information - THANK YOU! ... Eyebeebad Troll Warrior of the 2nd Rank Bristlebane _______________________________________________________________
ygData.messageBody:
This is great information - THANK YOU!

--- Sean.Clark@... wrote:> From: Sean.Clark@...>
>For all of you interested in the math, the lack of
>importance between levels in groups for high level> characters makes sense:
>Take the 2 cases mentioned, the first with a lvl 20
>and a lvl 24. The lower lvl char is getting 20/44 =
>45.5% of the exp, the higher char 24/44 = 54.5%.
>In the second case, a lvl 6 with a lvl 10 we get:
>6/16 = 37.5% for the lower lvl char and 10/16 = 62.5%
>for the higher lvl char So if you look at these
>numers it makes a LOT of sense that the difference
>in levels isn't as significant as you get into the> mid 20's and higher.

Eyebeebad
Troll Warrior of the 2nd Rank
Bristlebane
